column4: How can i see the boot scripts instead of the bootspalsh screen at startup?
do you want it always like that? or just a one-off?
at the boot-menu .. you select the kernel you want to boot .. press 'e' .. and edit that entry to add the word 'quiet' at the end (or remove the word 'splash')
Jowi: thanks for your info. I'll try it at boot
